scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Betrayal of Christ, with Judas Iscariot kissing Jesus, identifying him to the soldiers. Jesus, with a halo, is embraced by Judas, who holds a red pouch, possibly representing the thirty pieces of silver. A soldier in the foreground lies wounded, bleeding from the head, while another soldier behind Christ raises a sword. In the background, a fortified castle and other buildings are visible amidst a landscape with trees. The overall scene is dramatic and violent, illustrating a pivotal moment in the Passion of Christ.
